heading: HR00863
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE UNREASONABLE SIXTY-SIX CENTAVO PER KILOWATT-HOUR (PHP 0.66/kWh) MERALCO RATE INCREASE APPARENTLY DUE TO THE MALAMPAYA MAINTENANCE SHUTDOWN, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT CORRECTIVE MEASURES BE INSTITUTED TO STOP ANY FURTHER INCREASE TO THE COUNTRY'S ALREADY HIGH ELECTRICITY RATES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00863
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE UNREASONABLE SIXTY-SIX CENTAVO PER KILOWATT-HOUR (PHP 0.66/kWh) MERALCO RATE INCREASE APPARENTLY DUE TO THE MALAMPAYA MAINTENANCE SHUTDOWN, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT CORRECTIVE MEASURES BE INSTITUTED TO STOP ANY FURTHER INCREASE TO THE COUNTRY'S ALREADY HIGH ELECTRICITY RATES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2017-03-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-05-24
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2017-05-02
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-03-13;
